actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.
Referred to Subcommittee on Military Installations and Facilities.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Military Installations and Facilities

official_title: A bill regarding lease and development of certain real property, San Diego, California.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Navy to enter into leases for the development of real property located within the Broadway Complex of the Department of the Navy, San Diego, California. Outlines the terms and conditions for such leases, including the condition that the Secretary may not enter into such a lease until 21 days after the Secretary has submitted to the Senate and House Armed Services Committees a plan and justification for the development of the real property so leased.

titles.title: A bill regarding lease and development of certain real property, San Diego, California.
